title: Most valuable telecommunications brands in the UK in 2018
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: With a Brand value of around 18744 million U.S. dollars , Vodafone was the telecommunications brands UK Brand in , greatly surpassing BT , Sky as well O2 .
With its headquarters in the northwestern UK city of Suwon , Vodafone is a world leader in the manufacturing of consumer electronics and semiconductors .
Globally , Vodafone produces more smartphones and mobile phones than any other Brand , and has a strong presence .
gold: This statistic displays a ranking of the most valuable telecommunications brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of 2018 . Vodafone ranked first with a brand value of 18.7 billion U.S. dollars . O2 had a brand value of 8.6 billion U.S. dollars .
